text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c998370562425e70f4cf202a87112d638f5f7b38|patch 8.2.0835: Motif: mapping <C-bslash> still doesn't work>
patch 8.2.0835: Motif: mapping  still doesn't work

Problem:    Motif: mapping  still doesn't work.
Solution:   Accept CSI for K_SPECIAL.  Do not apply CTRL to the character
            early.  (closes #6150)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0835: Motif: mapping  still doesn't work 路 vim/vim@c998370

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/14798ab9a5ee4b94f6c12f1986207569356acfc8|patch 8.2.0836: not all :cdo output is visible>
patch 8.2.0836: not all :cdo output is visible

Problem:    Not all :cdo output is visible.
Solution:   Reset 'shortmess' temporarily. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6155)
